vivae.ros.simulator.client.impl

Class SynchronousClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • vivae.ros.simulator.client.impl.SynchronousClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SynchornousClient
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentSpawnSynchronousClient

    public class SynchronousClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements SynchornousClient
    This is general synchronous client for the SimulatorServer which is able to control the state of the simulation.
